item.title: CVE-2024-21764|2024-10-17T16:01:00.443Z -- rapid%20software%20llc -- rapid%20scada
item.description: In Rapid Software LLC's Rapid SCADA versions prior to Version 5.8.4, the product uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow an attacker to connect to a specific port.
